title.rendered: Artist Vincent Ballentine Selected to Help Honor Greensboro Six; Unveils Concept for Wyndham Rewards Commissioned Mural

content.rendered:
GREENSBORO, N.C., June 17, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Following a nation-wide search that saw more than 50 submissions from artists coast-to-coast, Wyndham Rewards®, in collaboration with the City of Greensboro and First Tee – Central Carolina, today announced artist Vincent Ballentine has been selected to design and install a commemorative mural honoring civil rights pioneers, The Greensboro Six, at historic Gillespie Golf Course in Greensboro, N.C.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/artist-vincent-ballentine-selected-to-help-honor-greensboro-six-unveils-concept-for-wyndham-rewards-commissioned-mural-302174501.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
